title: Hobbies
description: Hobbies explores a variety of activities that people do for fun and relaxation. Photographs of people enjoying different hobbies will make the reader excited to read and learn. Repeated sentence patterns support early-emergent readers as they learn about classifying information as well as using the inflectional ending -ing.
reviewWords: collecting, create, enjoy, hobbies, relax, writing
grammar: Inflectional Endings : Recognize and apply inflectional ending -ing
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word some
